title: Standing Yoga Seal
description: Dandayamana Yoga Mudrasana dahn-dah-yahm-nah yo-gah moo-DRAH-sah-nah Forward bends, Inversions, Standing, Warm-ups Primary body parts engaged Hamstrings, Quadriceps, Shoulders, Upper Back & Lower Traps Chest, Glutes & Hip Flexors, Spine, Triceps Strengthens legs, opens shoulders and chest Tones abdominal organs
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
